Harrison Pim Blog CV

I try to share what I’m working on. Sometimes I do that on this blog, and sometimes I give talks at conferences.

  • A new kind of image search 18 Oct 2018 Old-school image search isn’t good enough these days, and was never really an image search in the first place.
  • Exploring Wellcome Collection with computer vision 17 Oct 2018 Wellcome Collection is home to a lot of images. Here’s how we’re using machine learning to improve access to them.
  • Invisible Insights: learning from TripAdvisor reviews 28 Feb 2018 Analysing reviews of The British Museum with deep learning
